headline: Here's Why You Should Avoid Betting on Danaher Stock Right Now
summary: Persistent softness in the Life Sciences segment weighs on DHR's performance. An increase in operating expenses is an added concern.

headline: Danaher (DHR): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q4 Earnings?
summary: Shareholders of Danaher would probably like to forget the past six months even happened. The stock dropped 23.9% and now trades at $207. This might have investors contemplating their next move.

headline: GE Vernova: A Good Buy Post The Recent Correction
summary: GE Vernova is poised for strong revenue and earnings growth due to a solid backlog. Read why I maintain my buy rating on GEV stock.
